metadata.title: JODC Moored Current Meter data

creators.name: Oceanographic Department, Japan Oceanographic Data Center (JODC)

metadata.description:
Moored current meter data of the Japanese coastal Area.  

Data Distribution by J-DOSS (JODC Data Online Service System) via internet. Site maps and summary information available at this web site.
  
Base Internet/URL:  http://www.jodc.go.jp/service.htm  

[ A TCODE project ]
